meanings.sent1: I need to buy new skiwear before our skiing trip.
meanings.sent2: Her skiwear kept her warm and dry on the slopes.
meanings.sent3: The colorful skiwear made him look like a snow rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her skiwear was a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The skiwear was a must-have for the snowy adventure.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing clothing suitable for skiing.
meanings.sent1: Proper skiwear is essential for a safe skiing experience.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the skiwear part almost as much as skiing itself.
meanings.sent3: His skiwear dance routine was a hit at the winter party.
meanings.sent4: The skiwear competition was fierce among the skiers.
meanings.sent5: The skiwear added a touch of style to the snowy landscape.
